_comment: Engagement in Cyber Violence Against Women and Girls Scale from Cyber-aggression towards women paper
datasetApaReference: Jagayat, A., & Choma, B. L. (2021). Cyber-aggression towards women: Measurement and psychological predictors in gaming communities. Computers in Human Behavior, 120, Article 106753. https://doi.org/10.1016/j.chb.2021.106753

instruments.instrumentName: Engagement in Cyber Violence Against Women and Girls Scale
instruments.instrumentApaReference: Jagayat, A., & Choma, B. L. (2021). Cyber-aggression towards women: Measurement and psychological predictors in gaming communities. Computers in Human Behavior, 120, Article 106753. https://doi.org/10.1016/j.chb.2021.106753

scales.scaleName: Engagement in Cyber Violence Against Women and Girls

items.itemStemText: I engage in gaining access to a woman’s online accounts or profiles.
I engage in pretending to be someone I’m not when talking to a woman online.
I engage in monitoring a woman’s activities online.
I engage in spamming or repeatedly expressing anger towards a woman online.
I engage in intentionally misleading a woman online.
I engage in posting rumours or intimate photos of a woman online.
